commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Everyone went off to the place they wanted to hang out, huh?

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Oh my goodness! We missed the boat?!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: So what'll we do?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: What do you mean by that, Maki?

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: I mean what are we going to do after this?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Good question. Well, since we were sort of left behind, how about we go hang out somewhere together? We've got to enjoy our time, too.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Good idea. I agree with Karin. How about you, Kanan?

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: I'm for it!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Hmm, there was a big shopping mall around here, right? We could go window shopping there.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Then get some exercise in the bowling alley in the leisure center.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: And lastly, we can finish it all up by going to a famous hot spring and taking a nice bath!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Mari, did you happen to have a day all planned out?

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Of course! I mean, I came all the way out to Tokyo, you know?

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Agh! Everyone, you really don't need to worry about her!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Well, why not? It's not like I have anywhere I want to go.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: And if she thought it all up, how about we just go with Mari's request?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: No objection here!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Let's start with the shopping mall, then.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: I love you all! Thanks!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Maki, you can go for a spare!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: You're right. I'll give it a try, but don't expect anything.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Hah!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Gruh!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Shinyyyy!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: This is the end!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Why are they getting so passionate about this?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: They made a bet that the one with the lowest score has to treat everyone to ice cream after the bath.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Huh?! Hang on a second, does that include us?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: No, it's only among the third-years.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: When in the world did they decide on that?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: They started talking about that for some reason when you stepped out to phone home.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Hmph. Well, I'm glad I didn't get roped into it.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Well, how about we take a page from their book and have a competition of our own?

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Huh?! Hey, don't get inspired by any weird antics!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: But it looks really fun, you know? And besides, our club president did lose to you in the composing contest.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: What, you trying to avenge her?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Actually... Yes!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Heh, someone's acting all brave. All right then, what'll we bet?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Let's go with ice cream, like the others!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: You just want to eat ice cream, don't you?!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line:
Phew, now that was a great bath!
And the ice cream you have after a bath is the best of the best!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: *Giggle* And it's after we'd gotten some exercise, so it just feels amazing.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: There were so many baths. Did we all have to shove ourselves into just one?

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Well, it's more fun together, isn't it?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Still, the day was a lot more fun than I expected. Shopping, bowling, then a hot bath. *Giggle* It's been a while since I've had a day like this.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I had so much fun spending the day with everyone!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Me, too. Being left behind isn't so bad if we're all together.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Eli's right. Phew. It sure is nice to have friends. I'm really glad I did this school idol thing.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Yeah, we got to meet everyone and make friends with them.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: I'm in the same boat. Meeting Honoka and the others allowed me to rediscover my old goal and start running for it again.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: You're right about that. I wonder what I'd be doing now if not for school idols?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Guys, what're you getting all sentimental over? At this rate, there's only one thing to talk about next.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: How we have to get the School Idol Festival back on track! Right?

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Ahaha, right you are. I mean, performing at the School Idol Festival is really special.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: So let's think about what we should do about this, then.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Yeah, we really have to move efficiently!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I'm sure we should be able to pull this off well enough. I mean, we're so much on the same page we all got the same scores in bowling.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Ahaha, you're so right!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Then let's all put our heads together and do our best!
